attributes.action: house off lords. Needs to be disgarded. Serves us no purpose. And is Money pit.
attributes.background: The house of lords serves us no purpose. It's a money pit with unelected lords. Anything going forward in the future should be voted through the public or elected people.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the future of the House of Lords, but we're not sure exactly what you'd it to be abolished or reformed so members are elected.

You may wish to sign one of these open petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/259374
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/251967
